title: (x) VIBE magazine cover sans - FB Vibration {Angel}
content:
Any ideas what the all caps sans serif font on the latest issue of VIBE magazine is?  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [6c76\_1\_b.JPG.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225230943/http:/typophile.com/files/6c76_1_b.JPG.jpg) | 36.51 KB |
author: Brown Fox

comments.content: It's almost [Flama Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225230943/http:/vllg.com/Feliciano/Flama/mudTyper+Weights/). Maybe it's their own private [DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225230943/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_din_ot/&sample_text=MARY%20J%20BLIGE%2050%20CENT&sample_size=36). But I feel like I've seen that strange 'M' before.

May be Vibration Bold which has come up before.

[http://typophile.com/node/29944](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225230943/http:/typophile.com/node/29944 "http://typophile.com/node/29944")
Ahh, thanks Angel. That's where I've seen the 'M'.
